snippet: Allies say the former governor of Florida, a possible Republican contender for the presidency in 2016, has tried to present himself as less harsh than in the past.
abstract: Examination of former Florida Gov Jeb Bush's record shows that his views on range of issues have evolved both in style and substance even from time of his first run for office until now; Bush has said that he will not bend his policy views to satisfy electorate, whether in the primary or in general election, if he runs for president in 2016.
lead_paragraph: Allies say the former governor of Florida, a possible Republican contender for the presidency in 2016, has tried to present himself as less harsh than in the past.

headline.main: For Jeb Bush, Evolving Views Over 2 Decades
headline.print_headline: For Jeb Bush, Evolving Views Over 2 Decades
